testimonial: There will be no withdrawal without written orders and these orders shall never be issued.
author: ~ Field Marshall Sam Manekshaw

testimonial: Either I with hoisting the tricolor , or I with the wrapped tricolour will be back for sure.
author: ~ Capt. Vikram Batra

testimonial: Wounded and broken but still I stand tall. No challenge too over bearing, and no fear too consuming.
author: ~ Major Mohit Sharma

testimonial: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: ~ Lt Col Dhan singh

testimonial: Bravery is not the absense of fear, but the ability to overcome it.
author: ~ Col HoshiyarÂ Singh
